channel.title: Skilcape Hood Glitch Won't Work! Look Please!
channel.description:
Ok guys, I've looked at other people's TuT's. I've did what they said. I added the skillcape hood Id's to Hats, FullMasks, and FullHelm. They still won't work. IDK WHY! These are the codes I used for the Hoods. I added the codes to both Item.java and Item4.java
14074,14077,14080,14083,14095,14092,14086,14089,14131,14104,14107,14112,14110,14115
Please HELP!

item.title: Skilcape Hood Glitch Won't Work! Look Please!
item.dc:creator: @Soul_Breaker Soul Breaker
item.description:
@Soul_Breaker wrote:

try only putting them on 1 of them.

Read full topic
item.source: Skilcape Hood Glitch Won't Work! Look Please!
